channel.title: Personal on Qiu's Quibble
channel.description: Recent content in Personal on Qiu's Quibble

item.title: New Year's Resolution
item.description: 2011 here we come! In the spirit of continual learning, I’m going to write down the technology I’d love to learn this year. Haskell Now that I’m more interested in functional languages, I’d love to look into this “pure” functional language that inspired countless other ones of its kind. Lift Last year I scratched the surface of Scala, a hybrid JVM language. I’m very fond of it, and think it has tremendous potential.
